raw_response:
SUMMARY:  
This individual demonstrates a strong preference for high-quality, engaging storytelling, evident from the multiple products rated above 4.5. Consistent high ratings on programs encompassing themes of crime, science fiction, and character-driven narratives suggest a penchant for plots that blend realism with compelling drama. 

The review history indicates a mixed sentiment towards content involving themes of violence and substance use, with a few products evoking negative reactions due to unexpected or undesirable subject matter, particularly concerning sexual themes among youth. The individual appears to lean toward content with significant character development and subplots, highlighting their preference for narrative depth. 

In terms of quality, they appreciate productions with credible performances and insightful writing, often associating enjoyment with believable scenarios and relatable characters. Price sensitivity does not seem overtly defined, yet the varying ratings—especially a low rating for lower-quality productions—suggest an awareness of value based on content richness and delivery. 

Overall, this consumer favors thoughtful and well-produced media that offer substantial viewing experiences while maintaining a critique on narratives that fail to meet those expectations, showcasing a clear taste for quality entertainment that avoids frivolous portrayals.

target_interaction.title: Interesting plot
target_interaction.text: The plot is interesting yet somewhat predictable. Acting was all over the place
description: HD. Cold-blooded mercenary Vin Diesel undertakes a risky job to bring a 'special' young woman from Europe to New York City in this thriller.
